techmeme.title: The White House says that tariffs on China are set to rise to 104% at 12:01am ET Wednesday after China missed Trump's deadline to remove its reciprocal tariff (Elisabeth Buchwald/CNN)
Razer pauses direct sales of the upcoming Blade 16 and other laptops in the US as new tariffs loom (Antonio G. Di Benedetto/The Verge)
White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt says that President Trump believes the US has the resources and workforce to build iPhones in the US (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Snap releases sponsored AI lenses, a new generative AI ad format users can interact with and that is powered by One Snap, its homegrown generative AI tech (Allison Schiff/AdExchanger)
Nintendo says Switch 2 pre-orders in Canada "will not start on April 9, 2025 in order to align with the timing of pre-orders to be determined in the US" (Bradly Shankar/MobileSyrup)
